title: Donates
body: I bought a pay safe 5 to buy rengar. He was on offer and today he isnt.Can you do again rengar on offer?

replies.body: It looks like the sale for Rengar ended and returned to hiding, per [this week's Sales page](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-0912-1212). Stay up to date on the [ December Sales Schedule](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/december-sales-schedule) to help plan for content you might be interested in.  Though the sale is over, I hope that can help gear you up in the future!
